value: [Custom] Flickr Image overlaid with the Title and author information
css: @import url(//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300italic,300,400italic,600,600italic,700,700italic,800,800italic);.image img{width:100%;}.cycle-overlay{color:#fff;font-size:48px;background:rgba(76,117,151,.5);position:absolute;bottom:0;width:100%;padding:15px;text-align:center;}.cycle-overlay p{font-family:"Open Sans",sans-serif;color:#fff;font-size:48px;}.cycle-overlay .ownername span{border-bottom:2px solid #fff;}.content{font-family:"Open Sans",sans-serif;color:#fff;font-size:48px;}.content p{display:none;color:#fff !important;}.content p a{color:#fff !important;}.content p:nth-of-type(1){display:block;}
